desc: Genshin TS toolchain: TS -> .gs.ts -> IR JSON -> .gia -> inject .gil
cmdDev: Watch files and recompile on change
cmdMaps: List .gil map files (for helping configure mapId)
warnNotEntry: not an entry script, skipping IR/GIA output
warn_timerIntervalHighFrequency: setInterval interval {{ms}}ms is very short. High-frequency timers may cause performance issues and could be removed from the game; use motion controllers for movement and collision boxes for detection.
injector_targetTypeMismatch: [warn] Target NodeGraph type differs from folder category: id={{id}}, current={{current}}, expected={{expected}}; auto-corrected
injector_incomingTypeMismatch: [warn] Incoming NodeGraph type differs from target category: id={{id}}, current={{current}}, expected={{expected}}; auto-corrected
injector_signalMissing: [error] Signal "{{signal}}" is not defined; injection failed. Define it in the editor and try again.
injector_signalConflict: [error] Signal "{{signal}}" has multiple node ids for {{kind}}: {{first}} vs {{second}}
err_intListLikelyFloatList: Expected int_list, but got {{actual}}. Did you pass a normal number[] and it was inferred as a float list? Use bigint literals to force an int list, e.g. [123n, 456, 789, ...], or explicitly specify the list type with the `list` helper function.
err_dataTypeConversionFactionMustBeWired: dataTypeConversion faction input must be a wired value (no literal).
err_mergeServerSubTypeMismatch: [error] cannot merge different server sub_type (id={{id}}): {{a}} vs {{b}}
err_mergeServerModeMismatch: [error] cannot merge different server mode (id={{id}}): {{a}} vs {{b}}
err_mergeDuplicateVarsByName: [error] duplicate variables by name after merge ({{count}}).\n{{lines}}\n{{truncated}}{{hint}}
